"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Flame arrows set the block they land on with fire, dropping the arrowhead sometimes. Fire can also cause a creeper to explode as if lit by flint and steel."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.better_fire.1"}]}]
